text: hwla' aljnd almkdhdhibwn jund mhzwmwn, kama huzm ghyrhm min al'ahzab qblhm, kdhdhabt qablahum qawm nuh waead wafireawn sahib alquat alezymt, wathamud waqawm lut wa'ashab al'ashjar walbsatyn wahum qawm sheyb.
